Parameters: int: the new state. One of @B_android#support#design#widget#SwipeDismissBehavior#STATE_IDLE_E@, @B_android#support#design#widget#SwipeDismissBehavior#STATE_DRAGGING_E@ or @B_android#support#design#widget#SwipeDismissBehavior#STATE_SETTLING_E@.
onDragStateChanged(int).Description: Called when the drag state has changed.

onDismiss(android.view.View).Description: Called when view has been dismissed via swiping.

ClassDesc: Callback interface used to notify the application that the view has been dismissed.
